inclusion.criterion: Histologically proven NHL, and for which intensive chemotherapy is considered
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No previous chemotherapy and radiotherapy, no concurrent radiotherapy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Age > 75 years old, or Age < 15 years old
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with history of brain metastasis or CNS involvement.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Child's class B or C in patients with liver cirrhosis.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Impaired cardiac function with NYHA (New York Heart Association) classification ≧ Gr II.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of vomiting, non-bloody diarrhea, abdominal pain, fever, chills and loss of appetite for the past 3 days. He ate a salad at a restaurant prior to his diarrhea onset.
